values: To retreat means to run away because of losing a fight.
The army retreated because they were losing the battle.
n. movement away from a place or situation especially because it is dangerous, unpleasant, etc. 撤退
n. 撤退；休息寓所；撤退 vt. 退（棋）；使后退 vi. 撤退；退避；向后倾
